attributes.action: Ban concert tickets being resold for more than face value
attributes.background: Buying concert tickets for popular artists is extremely difficult. Queuing for ages and not getting tickets for real fans is very frustrating.  Then seeing them online for resale at a massive mark up only hours after they've sold out is heartbreaking.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/171819
